messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

remove the approval flow for as a contractor please action reports hello please flow contractor he submit his best wednesday december please action reports dear part established processes each required submit his weekly basis each friday past must submitted receiving because reports haven followed process please help cascade accordingly gets possible breakdown reports please note refers has left maternity other absence leave please update person record otherwise please person directly submit country date total days
